S.FORM: == kakiliman == Wi-lyen-T.G.Mu-tun "Wiliam T.G. Morton, 1819 a mihcs 8月8 日­-1868年7月15日",Amilika ngipenay a misaydang, 1946 a mihca i cacay pabinawlan tu picici'an tu ngipen pacumuden niza ku yi-mi, namahiza pala u ayzaay a ziday nu saayaway misanga'ay tu mibulsenay. 威廉·T·G·莫頓(William T.G. Morton,1819年8月8日—1868年7月15 . nilaculan uyzasa makayniay hakiya nu saayaway pacumud tu picici'an tu yi-mi, makay Mu-tun a nipakatineng malaheci ku nisanga'an tu sapibulsen a micici' nu lingatu, pasu mikakadumay ci How-le-s-Wi-al atu ci Ha-bu pasumana'ay ci Ca-al-s.T. Cye-kesun katuud ku musakamu situngus tu misanga', sabeleng amisaliwyuk tu picici'an nu pibulsen malaalaw tu teked a situngus. Mu-tun lecuh i Amilika Ma-say-cu-say-cow Ca-al-tu a tuse. masakapahenay ciniza i P-al a Mu-ngipen a padekuab minanan. 1842 a mihca malingatu mala misaydan nu ngipen-ke. katukuh 1843 a mihca laed a demiad. u pikakaan cinizaan tu atui' a misayda nu ngipen-ke makakadum ci How-le-s.Wi-al-s, ci Wi-al-s sakay pibelsen manamuh, nika i 1843 a mihca tu zikuzan , sazikuz malatusa misakakukaku tu. . cacay tu a mihaan, ci Wi-al-s mitanam tu i-ya-how-al-tan "syaw-ci" mala u sapibulsen, Kang-nay-ti-kek-ha-te-bu-te a picici'an malahciay tu, saca i Pu-s-tun ciniza pabinawlan paazih caay kalaheci. 一年後, . Ca-al-s .T. Cye-kek-sun u katinengan ni Mu-tu a misaydan atu ke-sya-cya, misabalucu' ci Mu-tunan mitanam miyung tu yi-mi. yi-mi i ayaw nu tulu lasubu a mihcaan matineng tu sipabulsenay tu, uyzasa i ayaw ni Mu-tu, u yi-mi caay henay kayung i tatenga'ay nu hekalay a picici'. piazih ni Mu-tun, u yi-mi hakay u sakapahay a sapibulsen. ayawen niza ku aadupan "pasu nipahabayan niza tu aadupan" atu mitananm tu uzip niza.1846 a mihcaan 9 a bulad 30 a demiad, ci Ay-pen.Bu-low-s belut micumud tu picici'an ni Mu-tun maydih papibubuc tu ngipen, maydih a tadeng masusud ku adadad nu pibubuc tu ngipen a pingaay. pahedupen ni Mu-tun ciniza tu yi-mi a malingatu micici', yu sinakatinengan tu ci Bow-low-s-te hawsa, caay katineng tu adada. namakayni maazih tu ni Mu-tun ku kalaheci. Pow-s-tun a sinbunan i saka tusa a demiad sakay picicic' sakamu satu, nika caay kalilid maazih nu katuuday. . ci Mu-tun misalunguc ci Pow-s-tun-ma-sa-cu-say-cow pulunng nu padekuan matenesay balakiay tu way-ke a misaydan ci Ye-han.C.Wa-lun pow-se makakadum, ayaw nu katuuday a misaydan mipaazih tu pabulsen ni Mu-tun a kawaw, Wa-lun pow-se misulul tu. 1846 a mihcaan 10 a bulad 16 a demiad tu sananal, ci Mu-tun i padekuad laup sa ku misaydan atu micudaday nuayawan nu imelangay a tademaw ci Ci-al-pow-te.A-pow-te papihedup tu yi-mi, zumasatu ci Wa-lun-pow-s miala patahkal tu ailucay a pucu'. Pawacay silaheciay ku mibelsenay, uyni pipaazih kasednun mapatahkal nu katuuday a sinbuyan. i picici'an tu pinaay a demiad ni A-pow-te, ci Mu-tun aci Cye-kek-sun misinsi tu cacay teked nu uzipay. uyzasa ci Mu-tun caay katenes macaculi tu kasitungus tu nu tekeday. sazikuzay i huing yadah ku nipalawpes tu kalisiw, caay pakay nu uzipay a nisanga'an a pakala tu nabalucu'an a nipaini. 1862 a mihcaan balangbangan nuuzip a pilihiza micumud tu Pow-tow-ma-ke a sakapuy nu hitay. u tineng niza tu nalimaan tu sapibulsen yungen niza i uzip nu tusa malebut a hitay i kalahitayan nu Bow-lye-te-li-kek-paw, Cyen-s-le-s-wi-al a kalalais atu Huy-te-ni-s-a kalalais. ciniza i 1868 a mihcaan 7 a bulad 15 a demiad i Niw-ye-cong-yanga aidangan mikisapi' sa mapulin mapatay. tademan i Ma-say-cu-say-cow-cyen-cyaw-se He-san a pitademan.

== kakiliman == Wi-lyen-T.G.Mo-ton "Wiliam T.G. Morton, 1819 a mihcs 8月8 日­-1868年7月15日",Amilika ngipenay a misaydang, 1946 a mihca i cacay pabinawlan to picici'an to ngipen pacomoden niza ko yi-mi, namahiza pala o ayzaay a ziday no saayaway misanga'ay to mibolsenay. 威廉·T·G·莫頓(William T.G. Morton,1819年8月8日—1868年7月15 . nilacolan oyzasa makayniay hakiya no saayaway pacomod to picici'an to yi-mi, makay Mo-ton a nipakatineng malaheci ko nisanga'an to sapibolsen a micici' no lingato, paso mikakadomay ci How-le-s-Wi-al ato ci Ha-bo pasomana'ay ci Ca-al-s.T. Cye-keson katood ko mosakamo sitongos to misanga', sabeleng amisaliwyok to picici'an no pibolsen malaalaw to teked a sitongos. Mo-ton lecoh i Amilika Ma-say-co-say-cow Ca-al-to a tose. masakapahenay ciniza i P-al a Mo-ngipen a padekoab minanan. 1842 a mihca malingato mala misaydan no ngipen-ke. katokoh 1843 a mihca laed a demiad. o pikakaan cinizaan to atoi' a misayda no ngipen-ke makakadom ci How-le-s.Wi-al-s, ci Wi-al-s sakay pibelsen manamoh, nika i 1843 a mihca to zikozan , sazikoz malatosa misakakokako to. . cacay to a mihaan, ci Wi-al-s mitanam to i-ya-how-al-tan "syaw-ci" mala o sapibolsen, Kang-nay-ti-kek-ha-te-bo-te a picici'an malahciay to, saca i Po-s-ton ciniza pabinawlan paazih caay kalaheci. 一年後, . Ca-al-s .T. Cye-kek-son o katinengan ni Mo-to a misaydan ato ke-sya-cya, misabaloco' ci Mo-tonan mitanam miyong to yi-mi. yi-mi i ayaw no tolo lasobo a mihcaan matineng to sipabolsenay to, oyzasa i ayaw ni Mo-to, o yi-mi caay henay kayong i tatenga'ay no hekalay a picici'. piazih ni Mo-ton, o yi-mi hakay o sakapahay a sapibolsen. ayawen niza ko aadopan "paso nipahabayan niza to aadopan" ato mitananm to ozip niza.1846 a mihcaan 9 a bolad 30 a demiad, ci Ay-pen.Bo-low-s belot micomod to picici'an ni Mo-ton maydih papiboboc to ngipen, maydih a tadeng masosod ko adadad no piboboc to ngipen a pingaay. pahedopen ni Mo-ton ciniza to yi-mi a malingato micici', yo sinakatinengan to ci Bow-low-s-te hawsa, caay katineng to adada. namakayni maazih to ni Mo-ton ko kalaheci. Pow-s-ton a sinbonan i saka tosa a demiad sakay picicic' sakamo sato, nika caay kalilid maazih no katooday. . ci Mo-ton misalongoc ci Pow-s-ton-ma-sa-co-say-cow polonng no padekoan matenesay balakiay to way-ke a misaydan ci Ye-han.C.Wa-lon pow-se makakadom, ayaw no katooday a misaydan mipaazih to pabolsen ni Mo-ton a kawaw, Wa-lon pow-se misolol to. 1846 a mihcaan 10 a bolad 16 a demiad to sananal, ci Mo-ton i padekoad laop sa ko misaydan ato micodaday noayawan no imelangay a tademaw ci Ci-al-pow-te.A-pow-te papihedop to yi-mi, zomasato ci Wa-lon-pow-s miala patahkal to ailocay a poco'. Pawacay silaheciay ko mibelsenay, oyni pipaazih kasednon mapatahkal no katooday a sinboyan. i picici'an to pinaay a demiad ni A-pow-te, ci Mo-ton aci Cye-kek-son misinsi to cacay teked no ozipay. oyzasa ci Mo-ton caay katenes macacoli to kasitongos to no tekeday. sazikozay i hoing yadah ko nipalawpes to kalisiw, caay pakay no ozipay a nisanga'an a pakala to nabaloco'an a nipaini. 1862 a mihcaan balangbangan noozip a pilihiza micomod to Pow-tow-ma-ke a sakapoy no hitay. o tineng niza to nalimaan to sapibolsen yongen niza i ozip no tosa malebot a hitay i kalahitayan no Bow-lye-te-li-kek-paw, Cyen-s-le-s-wi-al a kalalais ato Hoy-te-ni-s-a kalalais. ciniza i 1868 a mihcaan 7 a bolad 15 a demiad i Niw-ye-cong-yanga aidangan mikisapi' sa mapolin mapatay. tademan i Ma-say-co-say-cow-cyen-cyaw-se He-san a pitademan.
